Publish.LongDescription:
# Trading Cost Tweaker Do you feel your electricity is more expensive? Do you want to charge more for your electricity? Or is it that you think you should not be paying so much for the fire truck from your neighboring cities? Or do you want to rise the cost of importing cargo through trucks so high that companies are forced to find the cargo inside your city?
You've came to the right place. Introducing Trading Cost Tweaker that allows you to tweak various outside service/cargo trade parameters.
## Alert: This mod doesn't let you selectively enable services from outside connection. However, you can make it so you don't pay anything for their service. Each service can be individually configured from the Options UI.
Publish.ChangeLog: ## New Features * Option to modify the cargo costs for all four cargo transportation method.
